scripts.test: echo running all tests is not supported, maybe run: "yarn test:lint"
scripts.push: echo push is not yet supported
scripts.push:version: git add . && git commit -am 'version update' && git push
scripts.clean:modules: rm -rf node_modules yarn.lock package-lock.json lerna-debug.log yarn-error.log
scripts.clean:all: yarn clean && yarn clean:dist && yarn clean:modules && yarn clean:package-modules
